$Stone injured breaking up DP. Paper reported about 30 players gathered near 2B to watch attempts to revive Stone. After a few minutes Stone walked off rubbing back of head.

$Announcement that Kuhel fined $100 for slugging 120-lb. reporter  yesterday. Kuhel thought he was punching official  scorer who gave him an error that day.  Tribune reported Kuhel would have been in more  trouble if he had punched official scorer.
$Powell plunked in ribs.

$While Henry stood on the mound with his back to the runners using the rosin bag, the Senators launched a double steal. Henry was so rattled that he threw the rosin bag to second instead of the ball.  Stone then stole third as Henry wound up to throw the next pitch.  Cronin then removed the rattled Henry from the game.
